name: PIZZAVERSE
description:
Run the alien pizzeria of your dreams!

Use your many tentacles to multitask adding ingredients, putting pizzas into ovens, and delivering pizzas to customers. Use your mouse to queue up actions for your tentacles to carry out. 

Created by:MatthewProgramming 💻Brady
